frameworkContext.applicationContext:
**APPLICATION CONTEXT:**
When user lands on the home page, they see a banner image.
Application has navigation categories like shoes, just in, offers, clothes

**Home Page Structure:**
- Navigation bar at top (with links to categories)
- Hero banner below navigation
- Category callouts/cards in main content area (large clickable cards: "Clothes Shop the latest", "Shoes Shop the latest", etc.)
- Footer at bottom (with duplicate category links)

Add shipping details as follows:
   - Name: "Amanda Kim"
   - Email: "amanda.kim@example.com"
   - Street Address: "123 Main Street"
   - City: "San Francisco"
   - State: "CA"
   - Country: "United States"
   - Zipcode: "12345"
